solution_line_template: It would take one builder {days_for_3_builders} x {initial_builders} = <<{days_for_3_builders}*{initial_builders}={days_for_one_builder}>>{days_for_one_builder} days to build the cottage on his own.
6 builders can build the house in {days_for_one_builder} / {target_builders} = <<{days_for_one_builder}/{target_builders}={days_for_6_builders}>>{days_for_6_builders} days.
